definition: To recall or bring back to mind past events, experiences, or memories. It is commonly used when referring to remembering or reminding oneself or others about something that has happened in the past.

examples.german: Kannst du dich an den Vorfall erinnern?
Erinnerst du dich an unseren letzten Urlaub?
examples.english: Do you remember our last vacation?

examples.german: Ich erinnere mich nicht mehr an seinen Namen.
examples.english: I don't remember his name anymore.

examples.german: Sie erinnert mich an meine Schwester.
examples.english: She reminds me of my sister.
